details.rules: Deal X damage to every non-player character you've ever known, where X is the number of complaints you can  list in 30 seconds
details.flavour: "The world is irredeemable. I have yet to meet a soul worth saving." -Fester the Limp

details.rules: Sacrifice your life. Kill a character who you've met.
details.flavour: "My hatred for you makes the sun rise. Without it, I am nothing." -Fester's final words

details.rules: Stun a character for one turn
details.flavour: The sweet smell of bathtub toast

details.rules: Stun a character for two turns
details.flavour: Human beings are basically just big potato batteries

details.rules: Deal 6 damage to a character. If they die or go unconscious, return this card to your hand.
details.flavour: Created from a blood ritual in the 7th Cathedral

details.rules: While this card is in your hand, your attacks deal an additional d4 of damage and soak the target. Cast to spray a torrent of water in a line.
details.flavour: Stolen from Drake Monroe in his Goat Factory

details.rules: Describe a Cube. It will be created by the Tower.
details.flavour: In the beginning God created the heaven and the earth.

details.rules: Name a non-player character. They will be suddenly inspired to seek greatness. By next session they will be incredibly powerful.
details.flavour: There was a light within us that few can see. One day it will shine through.

details.rules: Name a character not on the current map. They take 100 damage.
details.flavour: 'I wish this guy would just die before we even showed up, that'd save us a lot of time' -General Tso

details.rules: While this card is in your hand, your melee attacks knock characters back 3 squares. Cast to knock a visible character back 3 squares.
details.flavour: You could have a steam train, if you'd just lay down your tracks

details.rules: While this card is in your hand, characters you damage are healed for the same amount instead. Cast to deal damage equal to the amount you healed this turn.
Blind characters in a 3x3 square with bean juice.
details.flavour: Industrial Grade

details.rules: Target visible NPC can no longer feel negative emotions towards target visible character.
details.flavour: Vewy Sowwy.

details.rules: Summon an ACME Anvil into existence above target character's head.
details.flavour: meep meep

details.rules: Target an article of clothing intended to be worn on a foot. A snake appears inside of it.
details.flavour: "Reeeeeeach for the skies" - The Sherrif

details.rules: Swap two words in a character's vocabulary until the end of the day. The character will be unaware that they are saying the wrong word.
details.flavour: "You cannot escape the responsibility of tomorrow by evading it today." - Abraham Lincoln

details.rules: Throw a pair of bola, a long range weapon design to wrap around a target.
details.flavour: Good for tripping and binding a long range target

details.rules: Target a large object or willing NPC and return this card to the deck after placing them in your inventory.
details.flavour: Brilliant for barging, barrowing, borrowing, bearing, busing, and bumming.

details.rules: One handful of pocket sand.
details.flavour: Good for blinding a close range target

details.rules: Choose a Blue or Green card in your hand. All cards in your hand become copies of that card.
details.flavour: Fax is short for facsimile, meaning "make similar".

details.rules: Move instantly as many spaces as you want in a straight line.
details.flavour: Used without permission from Netflix, Inc.

details.rules: Speak with any living NPC. Return this card to the deck and draw another.
details.flavour: Can also be used to contact the Gangster Party Line

details.rules: Speak with any dead NPC. Return this card to the deck and draw another.
details.flavour: Can also be used to contact the Dead Gangster Party Line

details.rules: Prevent a spell from being cast, or remove magic from target object.
details.flavour: As Salamu Alaikum Wa Rahmatulahi Wa Barakatu.

details.rules: Target visible character will take 25 damage the next time they rest.
details.flavour: Sweet dreams.

details.rules: All players return to Gerraro's Hideout. Return this card to the deck.
details.flavour: You cannot escape the responsibility of tomorrow by evading it today

details.rules: Target willing character ceases to exist for up to 1 hour. They return to the last spot they existed in afterwards.
details.flavour: "Have a vision. It is the ability to see the invisible. If you can see the invisible, you can achieve the impossible." - Shiv Khera

details.rules: Target NPC becomes tired.
details.flavour: "Perseverance is the hard work you do after you get tired of doing the hard work you already did."  - Newt Gingrich

details.rules: Choose X up to 5. An boundary, impenetrable from within, is placed X squares away from you in all directions as long as you'd like
details.flavour: "Don't spend time beating on a wall, hoping to transform it into a door." - Coco Chanel

details.rules: Pick a small animal or insect for your target to be swarmed by.
details.flavour: "So Moses stretched out his staff over Egypt, and the Lord made an east wind blow across the land all that day and all that night. By morning the wind had brought the locusts"

details.rules: Until your next turn, deal double damage and take double damage.
details.flavour: Squishy is a gaming term that refers to a character or unit with low base health or defense

details.rules: Creates a strong odor hardly noticeable by humans but detested by all other lifeforms.
details.flavour: ...and robots

details.rules: Target a doorway. The next living creature to pass through the door remains stuck in the frame until they take damage.
details.flavour: Outta my way son!

details.rules: Stand atop an object. Your character and the object are flung in the direction of your choice until obstructed.
details.flavour: As documented in: Using Glitches and Tricks to beat Cardmaster

details.rules: Flip a coin in place of your next roll. Heads for a critical success, tails for a critical failure.
details.flavour: The All Tomato. You either get the whole tomato, or none of the tomato.

details.rules: Learn the current location of an item you've touched in the past.
details.flavour: "At last I'll be able to track down the missing socks" - Angry Witch

details.rules: The ground shakes beneath you. All characters within 4 sqaures are knocked airborne and drop whatever they're holding.
details.flavour: Use near tectonic fault zones may be inadvisable

details.rules: Unarmed attacks deal double damage until you play your next card.
details.flavour: "Humour is the weapon of unarmed people" - Some Idiot

details.rules: Deals 10 damage. Return this card to the deck after using it.
details.flavour: Bonk

details.rules: Flip a coin. Heads: Deal 10 damage to visible target. Tails: Gun backfires, take 10 damage.
details.flavour: To get you out of a tight spot, like a colonial insurrection or a duel.

details.rules: Choose a 2x2 area to fill temporarily with an opaque smoke
details.flavour: "What the fuck did you say to me, you little shit?" - Tyler "Ninja" Blevins

details.rules: The next time you're unconscious, return to life with 20 HP. For each card you discarded from your hand after going unconscious, draw another of the same rarity from the deck.
details.flavour: What he saw on the other side changed him

details.rules: Pick a tile up to 2 tiles away. The next charcter to walk on this tile will fall over.
details.flavour: Nothing like a little prop humour

details.rules: Draws you towards a charcter in your line of sight at high speed. Both take 6 damage on impact.
details.flavour: C'mere

details.rules: Teleport to any visible space. Take damage equal to the number of squares moved.
details.flavour: Travelling is always a pain

details.rules: Possess a non-magic object within 5 tiles of your body until you lose concentration.
details.flavour: "There's something rather.. lively about this chair" - General Kudzo

details.rules: An aura surrounds you. NPCs believe this spell had the effect of your choice
details.flavour: Conjurers con jurors

details.rules: Summon a diembodied hand within 4 tiles to perform one simple action before vanishing.
details.flavour: "Magicians are a bunch of lazy bums" -Brinley

details.rules: Choose two visible points. You will be alerted the next time an NPC walks between them.
details.flavour: Mafia hideouts are often mysteriously empty when Rebel forces arrive to perform arrests

details.rules: The effect of the next spell intended for you is applied instead to the caster.
details.flavour: Magic knows no loyalty

details.rules: A magical light takes the shape of a cannon and instantly fires a real shot in the direction of your choice.
details.flavour: Cannonballs are designed to destroy ships and stone fortresses. The effect they have on the human body is unspeakable.

details.rules: A visible character of your choice receives a sandwich to the face.
details.flavour: After taking a sandwich to the face from one of his men, Coronel Kudzo was forced to retire, effective immediately

details.rules: While hodling this card in your hand, roll an additional d4 when you perform a ranged attack. Cast to deal 6 damage to a visible target.
details.flavour: They stood on the hill for a moment, mesmerized by the dazzling light. -Battlefield Diaries, General Polonius

details.rules: While holding this card in your hand, roll an additional d6 when you perform a melee attack. Cast to deal 6 damage to a visible target.
details.flavour: It didn't slash or pierce, but rather burned. The fallen glowed as though their souls were leaving their bodies. -Battlefield Diaries, General Polonius

details.rules: Allows you to throw any non-magic object you can fit in your hand as your ranged attack to deal an additional 6 damage.
details.flavour: You want it? Here.

details.rules: Targeted NPC becomes stuck in place for ten seconds.
details.flavour: Have my legs always been this heavy?

details.rules: Covers a non-magic object in a thin layer of ice.
details.flavour: Thou art all ice. Thy kindness freezes.

details.rules: You and any character you are touching burst into flames. 3d6 damage to each character ignited.
details.flavour: I'm taking you straight to hell.

details.rules: Touch an NPC to freeze both of you. Until your hand is removed, neither of you can attack or perform actions
details.flavour: Let's savour this moment forever.

details.rules: An aura surrounds you. NPCs who fail a perception check believe this spell had the effect of your choice.
details.flavour: "I don't know exactly what he did.. but I just don't feel.. right? Know what I mean?" -Barry the Bandit

details.rules: Summon a pigeon to perform one simple task
details.flavour: Will try not to be distracted by breadcrumbs.

details.rules: Summons a slice of toast the size of a Door
details.flavour: "This is excellent, but what if we cook it a second time?" - Man about to invent toast

details.rules: Your next melee attack deals an additional d6 and sets your target on fire, or turns a slice of bread into toast. Your choice.
details.flavour: "I'm about to turn your Kitchen Dream into a Kitchen Nightmare" - Diner Employee Sr.

details.rules: Throw an object up to 10 squares
details.flavour: "Real Good" -Divo

details.rules: Throw an object up to 50 squares
details.flavour: "I will not rest until every window is smashed. They are an insult to me and my kind" -Little Jimmy, neighborhood rascal

details.rules: Throw an object as far as you want.
details.flavour: I want this thing gone, understand? I want to never see it again.

details.rules: Throw an object as far as you want. It cannot be stopped.
details.flavour: I guess in a way, we're all still chasing it.

details.rules: Increases your rapport with a visible character
details.flavour: Are you related to Jean-Claude Van Damme? Because Jean-Claude Van Damme you’re sexy!

details.rules: Causes a visible character to like you.
details.flavour: Do you like raisins? How do you feel about a date?

details.rules: Causes a visible character to become attracted to you.
details.flavour: If you were a Transformer… you’d be Optimus Fine.

details.rules: Force any character you can name to act on their desire for you.
details.flavour: Bitch lasagna

details.rules: Copy the last Blue card used by any character
details.flavour: This is how stupid you look, watch this.

details.rules: Copy the last Green card used by any character
details.flavour: Stop copying me. Stop copying me.

details.rules: Copy the last Red card used by any character
details.flavour: “Through others we become ourselves.” ― Lev S. Vygotsky

details.rules: Copy the last Gold card used by any character
details.flavour: Nothing is original

details.rules: Return a Card with Blue Rarity to your hand
details.flavour: Don't retreat, reload.

details.rules: Return a Card with Green Rarity to your hand
details.flavour: A tactical reload is the action of reloading a weapon that has only fired a few rounds out of its magazine, and retaining the original magazine

details.rules: Return a Card with Red Rarity to your hand
details.flavour: Cowboy's only load up 5 of the 6 bullet chambers. In the 6th chamber, they leave a hundred dollar bill to pay the undertaker.

details.rules: Return a Card with Gold Rarity to your hand
details.flavour: “Peace is the time it takes to reload your rifle.” - Bob Dylan

details.rules: Draw 3 grey cards
details.flavour: Alright, okay what do we have here.. You guys hear about airplane food?

details.rules: Place 5 blue cards onto the table. Cast up to 3 of those cards.
details.flavour: You criticize, I improvise

details.rules: Place 5 green cards onto the table. Cast up to 3 of those cards.
details.flavour: People will forget what you said, people will forget what you did, but people will never forget when you pulled out a fish in a fistfight.

details.rules: Place 5 red cards onto the table. Cast up to 3 of those cards.
details.flavour: “In my mind's eye my thoughts light fires in your cities.” ― Charles Manson

details.rules: Deal 3 damage to a visible character with a painful bolt of electricity.
details.flavour: A smile costs less than electricity, but gives much light

details.rules: Deal 4 damage and stun up to 2 visible characters
details.flavour: "No." -Dr. Reed, in response to a question on whether or not a human should be able to shoot lightning out of their hands

details.rules: Deal 6 damage and stun to up to 6 visible characters
details.flavour: I had enough electricity in my booty to jump-start the whole of New York City

details.rules: Turn off the power in the current Cube. Draw 3 copies of Fork Lightning.
details.flavour: If your hate could be turned into electricity, it would light up the whole world. -Nikola Tesla

details.rules: Ignite a small fire on a visible, flammable object
details.flavour: In this case, we actually did start the fire.

details.rules: Hurl a ball of hot embers at a visible object
details.flavour: Time for a game of hot potato!

details.rules: Deal 15 damage and set fire to all flammable non-player objects within 6 squares
details.flavour: The best part is that nice campfire smell.

details.rules: Summon an Inner Sun the size of a baseball. The Inner sun is explosively flammable and burns forever.
details.flavour: My rage burns with the force of 1000 suns

details.rules: Jump up 3 metres
details.flavour: "Alright buddy, let's calm down ok?" - Warner Higgins, concerned father

details.rules: Jump 25 metres in the air
details.flavour: "Good lord, look at him go.." - Warner Higgins, concerned father

details.rules: Hover up to 5 feet off the ground until you lose concentration.
details.flavour: "I see. He is now a boy of the air, not of the ground." - Warner Higgins, concerned father

details.rules: Jump as high as you want
details.flavour: "I miss him everyday" - Warner Higgins, concerned father

details.rules: Target an object. It becomes moist, as if it had been sprayed with a fine mist
details.flavour: I think I'm going to need a change of clothes

details.rules: Target a point. Everything within 2m of this point is now saturated with water.
details.flavour: My plan: complete. Their day: ruined

details.rules: Summons 10000 gallons of water to a targeted point.
details.flavour: "Listen pal, I'm not afraid of getting a little wet. Go ahead and cast it" -Quomo the Quivering

details.rules: A Tsunami breaks over the play area from a cardinal direction of your choice.
details.flavour: Nature has a myriad of weapons to combat human arrogance.

details.rules: Change the value of thrown d20 or the next thrown d20 by 2
details.flavour: I can't see him, but I know he's there.

details.rules: You may force a thrown d20 or the next thrown d20 to be rerolled.
details.flavour: He will save us from our mortal errors

details.rules: Instill a religious vision of your choosing into target character
details.flavour: He lives deep in the hearts of all men

details.rules: All players will critically succeed on their next d20 roll this turn.
details.flavour: And the light shone bright upon the chosen

details.rules: Target NPC fails their current action and loses focus on you
details.flavour: "Ok one sec my homework is in my bag I'll grab it in a minute. How was your weekend?" -Little Sniver

details.rules: Target NPC will believe your next statement.
details.flavour: "Yeah of course I did my homework" -Little Sniver

details.rules: Change your appearance to match that of another exactly for as long as you'd like.
details.flavour: "It's-a-me! Mario! Sniver went into the other room to get his homework." -Little Sniver

details.rules: Rewrite the contents of a visible character's memory
details.flavour: "I'm at the end of my rope. I am done with homework. I will simply erase homework from the memory of the people" -Little Sniver

details.rules: Heal 8 to a visible character
details.flavour: "Yeah that feels a little better" -Hugo, recently decapitated

details.rules: Heal 10 to a visible character
details.flavour: "Well that sealed up the wound but it isn't really helping" -Hugo, recently decapitated

details.rules: Heal 30  to a visible character
details.flavour: "I feel better than ever. Except for my body, which I can no longer feel" -Hugo, recently decapitated

details.rules: Revive a dead character.
details.flavour: "I have returned- what a joyous day" -Huge, recently reunited with his body

details.rules: Travel up to 5 squares in any direction
details.flavour: These are great for the glutes

details.rules: Until end of combat, you can travel twice as fast
details.flavour: What are you running from?

details.rules: Teleport anywhere within 20 squares
details.flavour: If teleportation was impossible why did they make a word for it? Answer that one smart guy

details.rules: Teleport the entire party anywhere
details.flavour: Endless folds in spacetime reveal themselves to the worthy

details.rules: Take no damage from the next attack targeting you.
details.flavour: I barely felt that! Who taught you how to punch?

details.rules: Any damage dealt to you until your next turn is dealt both to you and your attacker
details.flavour: Let's see how you like it!

details.rules: Any damage dealt to you from the next attack targeting you is instead dealt to your attacker
details.flavour: I am rubber, and you are glue

details.rules: When you cast this card, name a character. They can no longer deal damage to you.
details.flavour: You would try some horseshit like that wouldn't you? Well I see right through you

details.rules: You can attack two additional times this turn
details.flavour: Before they even realized what happened, another punch sent them flying.

details.rules: You can attack four additional times this turn
details.flavour: Their defense won't last forever. Strike, and strike again

details.rules: You can make twice times as many attacks as you otherwise would this turn.
details.flavour: Every fighter has gaps between attacks which can be exploited. Just make sure to take them after your opponent is dead.

details.rules: Take X damage. You can attack X times this turn
details.flavour: Punches, kicks, and jabs stretch out before me into endless infinity, a fractal of iron striking limbs

details.rules: Place 3 green cards on the table. You may cast one of them.
details.flavour: No more of this bush league nonsense. We need some real power

details.rules: Place 3 Red cards on the table. You may cast one of them.
details.flavour: I might be able to pull it off- but just this once

details.rules: Place 3 Gold cards on the table. You may cast one of them.
details.flavour: Do you believe in miracles?

details.rules: Knock target visible character airborne. If this character is already airborne, knock them back 5 squares
details.flavour: He should've worn a windbreaker

details.rules: Shoot a blast of wind from your hand in any direction. All characters hit by the wind are sent airborne. If any of those characters were already airborne, knock them back 8 squares
details.flavour: Bitch, you look like a birthday candle

details.rules: Knock any number of visible targets airborne. If any are already already airborne, knock them back 10 squares
details.flavour: Rise, rise towards the heavens.

details.rules: A powerful hurricane is summoned over the play area which lasts as long as you want.
Summon an impassible wall of light on 1 square until end of turn.
details.flavour: "Quit the mime act and c'mon! We're getting out of here!" -Barry the Bandit

details.rules: Summon an immobile monk until end of turn who punches characters who come within range for 6 damage.
details.flavour: His name is Po

details.rules: Summon 3 immobile martial artists until end of turn who knock characters who come within range back 8 squares
details.flavour: Their names are Memboba, Imbosaa, and Steepedi

details.rules: Summon a copy of any non-player character
details.flavour: 'It's very nice to meet you Aunt Jemima' -Slick Sammy
